+def fsync(fd):
+    """Flush contents to disk using fdatasync() / fsync()"""
+    has_libc_fdatasync = False
+    has_libc_fsync = False
+    has_os_fdatasync = hasattr(os, 'fdatasync')
+    has_os_fsync = hasattr(os, 'fsync')

+        has_libc_fsync = libc and hasattr(libc, 'fsync')
+    if has_os_fdatasync:
+        _fdatasync(fd)
+    elif has_os_fsync:
